sentences.en: Curiosity had vanquished the desire of preserving his incognito, and he was recognized.
sentences.cn: 好奇心战胜了他那想掩饰真面目的愿望, 而且,他已被马尔塞夫认出来了.
你隐姓埋名地去旅行了?

sentences.en: Examine passed OK and incognito word.
sentences.cn: 审查通过了就可以改名字了.

sentences.en: He did not want to be recognized, so he travelled incognito.
sentences.cn: 他不想被人认出, 所以出行时隐瞒身分.
他更喜欢继续隐姓埋名下去。

sentences.en: Hotel inspectors have to travel incognito.
sentences.cn: 酒店检查员巡查时必须隐瞒真实身份。

sentences.en: I dismissed my old man here, and stayed incognito for three or four days.
sentences.cn: 我辞退了那位年老的乡下人, 隐姓埋名地呆了三、四天.

sentences.en: I was sent from London on the trail of Stevenson, traveling incognito.
sentences.cn: 我隐姓埋名, 是伦敦警方派我来追捕史蒂文森的.

sentences.en: Movie stars often prefer to travel incognito.
sentences.cn: 电影明星旅行时常喜欢隐瞒身份。

sentences.en: On the other hand, you can store your extension's settings from any window, incognito or not.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 你可以在任意窗口保存扩展设置, 而不用管是不是匿名模式.

sentences.en: That night, Lenin travelled incognito to the party headquarters.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上，列宁微服出行，去了党总部。

sentences.en: The prince travelled incognito to avoid crowds and ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 王子微服旅行以避开人群及避免欢迎仪式.

sentences.en: Till we can achieve something, let us live incognito, say I.
sentences.cn: 直到我们取得了成就时, 我想说, 那就让我们隐姓埋名地去生活吧.

trans.tran_cn: 改名的；微行的；隐姓埋名的
trans.tran_en: Someone who is incognito is using a false name or wearing a disguise, in order not to be recognized or identified

trans.tran_cn: 化装地；用假名地，隐姓埋名地
